title: Tide Is It In My House
body: No other washing detergent exist for my household. Tide is it. It cleans our clothes exceptionally well. It gets rid of the sweaty smell, and the stains disappear on every wash. And with the pods, it takes the hassle of measuring out of the equation. No accidental messy spills. No way of using too much. These pods are perfection if nothing else is. I wouldn't dare buy another brand. Tide is the beginning and end for our clothes.

title: Cleanliness in a pod
body: A great change from liquids that can spill and add to much add to little. Makes doing chores just a bit easier and a better plan as well, IE its easier to know how many pods / how many washes you have so how often you have to order more pods....üòÅAnd great to try and save a little more money here and there, Tide recommends wash in cold, and that's how we do ours and it works great. Enjoy.

title: Great Value
body: Great value for the quantity you get. Love using this scent. The scent is not too strong and cleans clothes effectively.

title: Love these!

title: Great Laundry Detergent, Convenient Design
body: Recently have switched from pourable liquid detergent to pods and I am very happy with these Tide Pods. The packaging is great and offers a locking lid that is easy to take off. This detergent keeps my clothes clean and smelling fresh! I have found that one pod is typically enough, even for a large laundry load. Great price point!

title: Everything Gets Cleaner with Tide

title: Tired of using liquid detergent?
body: Then give these a try. You don't need to portion out anything since you can simply pop one to three of these in and turn on the washer. These will also dissolve in cold water, so be sure to turn it to that setting to save yourself some money.The scent will not blow you away, but it's there. I combine it with scent boosters to get an extra kick.Overall, it's a nice product that makes doing laundry just a little bit easier by .0005%.

So I lose on both ends .

title: If you have really stinky stuff go with the Tide sport
body: I'm sure everyone knows how pods work, toss them in and then let the washer do it's thing. The scent is pleasant but not strong. It won't take care of strong smelling stink like mildew but, for everyday stuff it works. I think the tub is good value for the money. This should last us six months to a year.

title: Both products are fine. Packing was poor.
body: I would give the products 5 stars but the packing was poor. Putting an 18lb box of kitty litter with a 6 lb container of laundry detergent in one box that was too small for those two items was a bad idea. The total weight of the box was nearly 25 lbs. Luckily both items arrived intact if a bit squished.

title: Tide pods
body: Good price

title: Easy to use
body: The scent was really good in the beginning after opening the bag, the clothes smelled so good after washing but now seems to be loosing the smell.

title: Cold water loves it!
body: I grew up using Tide products. Was getting upset when using Tide pods with cold water. They weren't dissolving. These particular pods are designed to dissolve in cold water. No longer finding them stuck to my clothes! They work well in hot and warm water too. I can't find these in stores. I've got them on an Amazon subscription so I don't run out. I have two laundry areas and find these don't take up a lot of space. Cold water saves you money. Try these!

title: Amazing
body: Bought these for my girlfriend who has a dog and she absolutely loves the smell of the tide pods. I was particularly interested in the Pet dryer sheets to see if they really work and she says they do! Would recommend and buy again :)

title: Tide is the best laundry detergent!
body: I tried a lot of laundry detergents, especially when new ones appear on the market, but I keep returning to Tide. Nothing else gets my clothing as clean and fresh as Tide. These pods are very handy as it is easy to see how many more washes I have before I have to repurchase. Love the pods!

title: Great Detergent!!
body: Love that clothes smell great after wash!!

title: Cleaner for Sure
body: Tide couldn't be any cleaner. Clothes are REALLY Cleaner with this product.
